III.i.1.B.3.e
.
Completion of Administrative Decision When Qualifying Service Cannot Be Verified
When qualifying service cannot be verified in a claim for compensation or DIC, complete an administrative decision as directed by
M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, 1.C
before administrative denial of the claim.
References
:  For more information on
making decisions on the matter of qualifying service, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 1.A.1.f
, and
service requirements for pension eligibility, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart i, 1.2
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Service Requirements and Verification of Eligibility
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
